history.content: I just posted a course announcement for a one unit course that might be of interest to you. You're probably already aware that you can look in the campus Schedule of Classes for courses that are in Engineering or Data Sciences and offered in summer. There's a 2 unit course in Design Innovation that I would take if I hadn't promised myself I wouldn't keep going back to school.

Hello all,

I'm a rising junior undeclared Data Science minoring in CS. So far I've taken CS61A, CS 61B, and EE16A, and I plan on taking Data 8 or EE16B this fall (waitlisted for Data 8 at position 283) (side question: is there is a good chance I would get off the waitlist?). 

I'm in enrolling for summer classes to complete my R1B course (session D) , and I'm looking for another 2 unit course that might help me within Data Science, Cognitive Science or Public health for the summer. If it's more than 2 units, then I would prefer if the course doesn't conflict with Session D. 

If DeCal's were an option I would've taken that, but for now, I'm not sure where to look. 

Any advice is appreciated! 

Thank you so much in advance! 

Good luck on finals.
history.subject: Fun Data Science courses for the summer
